snippet: With the Big East realigning and Notre Dame bound for the Atlantic Coast Conference, the top-seeded Fighting Irish beat Connecticut for their first conference crown since 1994.
abstract: Notre Dame women's basketball team beats Connecticut, 61-59, to win Big East Conference title.
lead_paragraph: With the Big East realigning and Notre Dame bound for the Atlantic Coast Conference, the top-seeded Fighting Irish beat Connecticut for their first conference crown since 1994.

headline.seo: Notre Dame Gets Big East Title on Last Try
headline.main: Notre Dame Exits With a Title
headline.print_headline: Notre Dame Exits With a Title
